intro: Drosanthemum erigeriflorum, commonly known as the upright-flowered drosanthemum, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family, commonly referred to as the ice plant family, characterized by their succulent leaves and flowers. The plant produces small, daisy-like flowers that are typically pink or purple in color. It thrives in well-drained sandy soils and requires full sun exposure. Drosanthemum erigeriflorum is often cultivated for its ornamental value and drought tolerance.
